name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated **Go Engineer** with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing distributed systems and utilizing **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud** to deliver scalable solutions. My technical proficiency includes managing infrastructure with **Terraform**, **Kubernetes**, and automating CI/CD processes, notably through **GitOps** practices. I have a solid command of **Infrastructure as Code** principles, coupled with hands-on experience in **IAM**, **Secret Management**, and **Threat Modeling** for secure application deployment.
Additionally, I bring a comprehensive understanding of observability and telemetry, ensuring robust monitoring through practices that align with software development best practices and design patterns. My background also extends to working within **Linux** environments, applying strong problem-solving and debugging skills to enhance system performance.
I have a proven track record of collaboration and communication, complemented by a commitment to open-source contributions and attention to detail, allowing me to effectively lead projects and work within diverse teams.
